about_the_game:
VInput is a plug-in for sending data to VTubeStudio. Support game controller, racing steering wheel, time data, hardware monitoring data and custom formula.

Controller
It supports full key detection of game controller. Tested devices include (XBox Controller, PS5 Controller)
Note: The Nintendo Switch Controller is special and can only be used after key mapping in steam.
Support common racing steering wheel.

Time data
Support time data of year, month, day, hour, minute, second, millisecond, week and more.

Hardware monitoring data
It supports data such as occupancy, frequency and temperature of hardware devices such as motherboard, CPU, graphics card and hard disk.

Custom Formula
For complex requirements, such as the position of fingers on the fine control handle, you can use the custom formula function to calculate and output the existing data.
The output of the formula itself can also be used as input by other formulas.
Because formulas are scripts in Lua language in essence, you can write complex judgment logic in addition to formulas.

QQ Group:751202335 enter password:123

Model in video is not included

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT710
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
